inscription: Inscription: Retrato de Dick Knight, Nora Knight y Dinah Knight, sus hijas, y se comeno a pintar el dia 17 de abril 1946 al VIII cumpleanos de Dinah Knight (Portrait of Dick Knight, Nora Knight and Dinah Knight, his daughters, begun 17 April 1946 on the eighth birthday of Dinah Knight)
title: Portrait of the Knight Family
